Argrabhakh Class Light Escort (Military Starship)

The Argrabhakh is a typical Vargr light escort built for the corsair market. It has unusually long endurance for a Vargr design, and reasonable acceleration. The provision of two combat pinnaces allows a wide variety of missions to be performed. The power plant is typically run at 67% of the maximum power, which allows full life support and full maneuver. Endurance is 28 days at this power level. 24% power (80 days) is sufficient for life support and 1-G, and full power can be maintained for up to 19 days.
